controller.user

Class LoggedUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.user.LoggedUser

  • public class LoggedUser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the currently logged in user.
    Version:
    11-17-2013
    Author:
    Tim Mikeladze
